channel.title: Spawning objects client side?
channel.description:
How do I make it that it is client side so it doesnt take up any lag on the server. So that when people login with that client the objects I put on client side will be there, And people who dont use my client cant see them?
I know a way to do it with a command, But I want to know how to do it like when you login with the client.

item.title: Spawning objects client side?

item.description:
@bjc22 wrote:

Im not worth a penny though

Read full topic
